projects.title: BlockBlister
projects.description: Movie app created using Firebase CRUD, Webpack, and ES6 Modules to allow users to add movies to a database. Once added, a user can click on each movie to rate it and to learn more about it. A user can also delete a movie or add it to their watchlist.
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla Javascript, Firebase, Version Control with Github

projects.title: PurpleMonkeyDishwashr Beer
projects.description: Group project for an imaginary beer company. We used HTML, CSS, and we manipulated the DOM using Javascript. I was responsible for the homepage.
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github
